title: Cinefantastique Vol 02 No 4 (Summer 1973)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Cover story on Amicus Films features interviews with Milton Subotsky and looks at The Legend of Hell House and Frankenstein and the Monster from Hell. Also includes and on-set report from Soylent Green, an interview with Jacques Tourneur, and reviews of Asylum, Countess Dracula, Dracula 1972 A.D., I, Monster, Moonwalk One, Vampire Circus, You'll Like My Mother, and more.
